hero.subtitle: We design and ship custom electronics: PCB design, firmware, and connected products. From idea to tested prototypes.

about.title: About TES
about.p1: TES (Tröndle Embedded System) is a Swiss embedded design studio led by Nicolas Tröndle. We turn ideas into reliable hardware — combining PCB design, firmware, and practical testing.
about.p2: We’ve worked across ESP32, RP2040, and STM32 platforms; CAN, USB, and Wi‑Fi; and thermal/power‑aware designs. We care about clean schematics, manufacturable layouts, and robust software.
